description:
In 2013 Ransmeier & Spellman P.C. expanded its practice into the Lakes Region by merging with Arthur Hoover’s established practice, the Alton Law firm. The addition of Ransmeier & Spellman P.C.'s resources provides clients in the Lakes Region with the benefits of a full-service, sophisticated team of lawyers, without losing the connection to the local community that Alton Law always provided. 

The attorneys in our Alton office focus their practice on matters involving real estate, land use and estate planning. Since 1979 the law firm of Ransmeier & Spellman P.C. has assisted countless businesses, corporations and individuals with their legal matters. As experienced trial attorneys, we have the knowledge to help you reach your business goals. Whether you are creating a new business or planning to expand, we can sit down with you and help you formulate a successful plan of action. We explain the guidelines and laws that pertain to your industry, assist you with finding the right type of financing, and answer your questions about trademarks, accounting practices and marketing strategies.

Perhaps your business has been named in a lawsuit or you wish to initiate litigation against someone over a breach of contract or a trademark infringement. Our law firm can help you put together a compelling case that supports your claim or defense. We are experienced with many industries, including airline, manufacturing and technology.

From the day we opened our doors, Ransmeier & Spellman P.C. has made it our aim achieve the most favorable outcome for our clients, in the most strategic, efficient and intelligent manner, while treating everyone honestly and fairly. We are known for taking the time to address clients’ individual needs and keeping their goals as the focus of every case we handle. In addition to estate planning, Ransmeier & Spellman P.C. can help you with business and commercial law, probate, personal injury, mediation and arbitration, employment issues, bankruptcy, aviation and criminal defense.
